comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: AUTO KILLS DR. W.J. BEATTIE; Physician Struck in Front of a Hotel in Bretton Woods. Special to The New York Times. September 27, 1913, Saturday BRETTON WOODS, N.H., Sept. 26. -- Dr. W.J. Beattie of Littleton was killed instantly at the Crawford House at 1 o'clock this afternoon, being struck by an automobile as he was crossing to Mrs. William A. Bayon's bungalow. The motor car was from the Howard House, in Barlette. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9B02E7D8163DE633A...

comment.author: 21686909@N07
comment._content: Well, I guess that narrows the time window of this photo a bit, Richard.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Richard Arthur Norton and budderflyman:  Thanks for bringing the date to our attention.  We'll narrow the range based on Beattie's death date next time we update.
